type.name: characterized_individual_physical_object
type.description: A characterized_individual_physical_object is an Activity_as_individual or a Product_as_individual.

description.p: A Possession_of_property is a relationship between an Independent_property_definition and an individual physical object, and that indicates the individual physical object has the property.
The individual physical object can be either a Product_as_individual or an Activity_as_individual.

ul.li: the Range_property_definition that is 9.999 to 10.001 Kg; and
the Product_as_individual that is the widget with serial number 98/1234,

example.p: that indicates the mass of the widget lies within the range, is a Possession_of_property.

explicit.name: base_independent_property
explicit.description: an Independent_property_definition that is possessed by the described_element.
